source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子入菩薩廣大行，正念思惟，心無障礙，求菩薩智慧境，見菩薩神通事，念菩薩勝功德，被菩薩堅進甲，生菩薩大歡喜，趣菩薩不思議，遊菩薩大自在，修菩薩功德地，觀菩薩三昧地，住菩薩總持地，具菩薩大願地，得菩薩辯才地，成菩薩諸力地。
translation: 爾時，善財童子入菩薩廣大行，正念思惟，心無障礙，求菩薩智慧境，見菩薩神通事，念菩薩勝功德，被菩薩堅進甲，生菩薩大歡喜，趣菩薩不思議，遊菩薩大自在，修菩薩功德地，觀菩薩三昧地，住菩薩總持地，具菩薩大願地，得菩薩辯才地，成菩薩諸力地。

source_sentence: 漸次前行，至於彼城，尋訪大天今在何所？
translation: He gradually travels on to that city and asks where the great gods are today.

source_sentence: 人咸告言：「在此城內，現廣大身，處高顯座，為眾說法。」
translation: Everyone told him, "Here in the city, he has shown himself a large body, standing tall and prominent in his seat, and he's preaching to the crowd."

source_sentence: 善財聞已，往至其所，頂禮其足，合掌而立，白言：「聖者！
translation: After Sunetra heard this, he went to him, bowed his head at his feet, put his palms together, and stood up, saying, "Sage!

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，而未知菩薩云何學菩薩行，云何修菩薩道；我聞聖者善能教誨，願為我說。」
translation: I had first aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment, but I didn't know how bodhisattvas train in the bodhisattva path or cultivate it; I've heard that the noble one is well able to teach it, so please explain it for me."

source_sentence: 爾時，大天即於是時，長舒四臂，取四海水，自洗其面，持諸金華以散善財而告之言：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the Mahādeva spread out his four arms, took the four waters of the ocean, washed his own face, held gold flowers, scattered good treasures, and told him, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 甚奇希有！
translation: extremely rare!

source_sentence: 乃能如是求善知識。
translation: It's then that they can seek a good friend in this way.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 一切菩薩出現世間，最極希有，難可得聞，難可得見，如眾生中芬陀利華，於險難處為歸、為救；如安隱城於黑闇處作大光明，猶如朗日；又如導師引諸眾生入佛法門，亦如猛將善能守護一切智城。
translation: All bodhisattvas appearing in the world are most rare, difficult to hear, and difficult to see, like the puṇḍarīka among sentient beings that provides refuge and salvation in a place of danger or difficulty, like the city of peace that makes a great light in a dark place like a bright sun, like a guide who leads sentient beings into the Buddha's teaching, or like a fierce general who well guards the city of omniscience.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 菩薩如是難可遇會，唯身、語、意具足清淨，無諸過失，然後乃得見其形相，聞其辯才，於一切時常現在前。
translation: It's so difficult for a bodhisattva to meet someone like that, except that his body, speech, and mind are completely purified and without faults, and then he'll be able to see his form, hear his eloquence, and always appear before him at all times.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我已成就菩薩解脫，名為雲網。」
translation: I've accomplished the bodhisattva's liberation, which is called cloud netting."

source_sentence: 善財白言：「聖者！
translation: Shanzai said, "Sage!

source_sentence: 雲網解脫境界云何？」
translation: What is the sphere of the cloud net of liberation?"

source_sentence: 爾時，大天於善財前示現種種金聚、銀聚、瑠璃聚、玻瓈聚、硨磲聚、碼碯聚、摩尼寶聚、無垢藏寶聚、毘盧遮那寶聚、普現十方寶聚、寶冠聚、寶印聚、寶鬘聚、寶璫聚、寶釧聚、寶鎖聚、寶鈴聚、寶瓔珞聚、寶珠網聚、種種眾色摩尼寶聚、種種一切寶莊嚴聚、種種如意摩尼寶聚，一一積聚皆如大山。
translation: At the time, the great god showed Sunjob a variety of gold, silver, rutile, glass, coral, agate, maṇi-jewel, stainless-store, and vairocana-jewel clusters, a jewel cluster in each of the ten directions, a jewel crown cluster, a jewel seal cluster, a jewel garland cluster, a jeweled charm cluster, a jeweled armor cluster, a jeweled lock cluster, a jeweled bell cluster, a jeweled jewelry cluster, a jeweled net cluster, a variety of colored maṇi-jewel clusters, a variety of adorned clusters of all treasures, and a variety of wish-granting maṇi-jewel clusters, each of which was like a large mountain.

source_sentence: 又復示現一切華、一切香、一切鬘、一切蓋、一切幢、一切幡、一切塗香、一切末香、一切衣服、一切音樂、一切五欲娛樂之具，亦如山積，及現無數百千萬億諸童女眾。
translation: They also showed all the flowers, all the fragrances, all the garlands, all the lids, all the banners, all the streamers, all the perfumes, all the powdered fragrances, all the clothing, all the music, and all the articles of amusement for the five desires, all of which were like mountains, and they showed an incalculably large assembly of hundreds of thousands of thousands of millions of young women.

source_sentence: 而彼大天告善財言：「善男子！
translation: The great celestial addressed Sun Cai, saying, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 今恣汝意可取此物，供養如來，修諸福德，并施一切，攝取眾生，顯示難捨而能捨故，令其修學檀波羅蜜。
translation: Now, as you wish, you can take this thing, make offerings to the Tathāgata, cultivate virtue, and give it to all living beings, showing that it's difficult to abandon but can be abandoned, so that they can train in the perfection of giving.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 如我為汝示現此物，教汝行施，乃至普為一切眾生，悉亦如是，皆令以此布施善根熏習力故，令其息滅不欲行施障勝行心，於佛、法、僧最勝福田善知識所，恭敬供養，種諸善根，增長善法，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: Just as I showed you this thing and taught you to practice generosity, so too will I do for all sentient beings, so that the power of the perfuming of these good roots of generosity will cause them to quell their desire to practice the hindering superior practices of generosity and to respect and make offerings to the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha, the most excellent field of merit of good teachers, plant good roots, increase good qualities, and give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 若有眾生貪著五欲，自放逸者，為其示現不淨境界。
translation: "If sentient beings become addicted to the five desires and abandon themselves, it will show them the realm of impurity.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 由彼眾生愚癡迷惑，被諸女色昏醉其心，猶如嬰孩無有自性；亦如素衣易受染色，為欲所溺不能得出；如糞中蟲樂著糞處；如穢弊猪不淨嚴身；如犯罪人種種繫縛；如世劫賊恒奪法財；如犯極刑將付魁膾；如瞽導盲俱墮坑險；如船泛海遭遇惡風，損害善根，喪諸法寶；如近惡龍毒氣熏染，永離戒香，夭傷慧命。
translation: Because of their delusion, those sentient beings are deluded by the form of women, and their minds are intoxicated, just like a baby with no self-nature; they're like a plain robe that's easily stained and can't escape because it's drowned in desire; like a worm in the dung that delights in the dung; like a filthy pig that's impure and adorned; like a criminal bound in various ways; like a worldly thief who's always stealing the Dharma treasure; like a man who commits the ultimate punishment and is about to be executed; like a goose guiding a blind man into a pit; like a ship sailing across the ocean that encounters a bad wind, which damages good roots and robs it of its Dharma treasure; and like a dragon that's near a poisonous breath, which permanently parts with the fragrance of precepts and prematurely injures the life of wisdom.

source_sentence: 以要言之，愚癡嬰孩為欲所盲、為欲所繫、為欲所使、為欲所迷，恒順欲心而為僮僕，常隨欲轉如犢逐母，為欲所縛不得自在。
translation: To summarize, a foolish infant is blinded by desire, tethered by desire, made to act on desire, and deluded by desire, always serving as a servant to a desiring mind, always following desire around like a calf chasing its mother, and bound by desire and unable to be free.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我為此等盲瞑眾生生憐愍心，方便濟拔。
translation: "For these blind and close-minded sentient beings, I've shown compassion and skillfully rescued them.

source_sentence: 先現端正可愛女身稱悅其心，令其耽著；復現命終，其身壞爛，為諸鳥獸之所噉食，種種不淨如屍陀林；復現恐怖羅剎女形，身狀黑雲，鬢髮丹赤，大腹下垂，狗牙上出，以人髑髏而為嚴飾，手執利劍發大惡聲。
translation: First, I'll present the body of a beautiful, upright woman to please her mind and cause her to become attached; then I'll present the body of a woman whose life has ended, which is decayed and rotted, eaten by birds and animals, and is variously impure like a cemetery; and then I'll present the form of a terrified rāṣṇa with a body shaped like a black cloud, hair on her hair that's red, a belly that drops, dog teeth that protrude, a human skull for adornment, and a sharp sword in her hand that makes a loud, bad noise.

source_sentence: 現如是身向染欲者，令起驚厭，心生惶怖。
translation: Presenting such a body to someone with defiled desires, they become frightened and disgusted, and their mind becomes frightened.

source_sentence: 因斯發起求見我心，我應彼形為其說法，令除厭怖，安住戒身，成就最勝戒波羅蜜，具足十種波羅蜜門，乃至圓滿菩提勝果。」
translation: Because of this, they arouse a desire to see me, and I will explain the teaching to them in their form, remove their disillusionment and fear, stabilize their moral body, achieve the supreme perfection of morality, and fully accomplish the ten perfections up to the excellent fruit of enlightenment."

source_sentence: 爾時，大天即為善財種種稱讚戒波羅蜜，而說偈言：「如諸眾生及草木，　　一切生長咸依地，　世及出世諸善根，　　皆依最勝尸羅地。
translation: It was then that the great gods praised the perfection of precepts for Shanzai in various ways and spoke in verse, saying, "Just as all sentient beings and plants and trees grow based on the ground, the worldly and transmundane good roots all rely on the most excellent ground of Śīlabhadra.

source_sentence: 無戒欲求生善道，　　如鳥無翼欲飛空，　如人無足欲遊行，　　亦如渡海無船筏。
translation: Without precepts, a person desiring to pursue the good path is like a bird without wings wishing to fly into the air, like a person without legs wishing to travel, or like crossing the ocean without a raft.

source_sentence: 如諸苦行食根果，　　飲水自活住山林，　或衣樹皮如獸居，　　無戒不得為清淨。
translation: Like other ascetics who eat the fruits of their roots, drink water to live in the mountains or live like animals clad in bark, their lack of precepts doesn't lead to purity.

source_sentence: 有剃四周留頂髮，　　或不沐髮縈為髻，　或有裸形或異服，　　此等無戒皆如戲，　或於氷河而洗浴，　　或投盛火以焚身，　或昇高山自墜形，　　此等無戒徒為死。
translation: If someone shaves their head and wears their hair on top, or if they don't wear their hair in a bun, or if they're naked or dressed in a different costume, such lack of precepts is like a game, or if they wash themselves in an icy river, or if they throw themselves into a raging fire and burn themselves, or if they ascend a high mountain and fall into their own form, such lack of precepts is nothing but death.

source_sentence: 或浴華池辯才水，　　或恒飲浴殑伽河，　晝夜求福以為依，　　此等無戒空無果。
translation: Sometimes they bathe in the water of the flower pond and explain their abilities, or they drink constantly in the Gaṅgā River, seeking merit by day and night for support, and these lacking the precepts are empty and fruitless.

source_sentence: 或於日夕三時浴，　　或復三時作護摩，　却粒自默如啞羊，　　無戒苦身無所利。
translation: Sometimes they bathe three times each day and night, or they make a guard three times, but they grain themselves silently like dumb sheep, lacking the benefit of the body that suffers from the precepts.

source_sentence: 欲住天宮盡天壽，　　服天瓔珞以嚴身，　飲食天中諸上味，　　持戒一切皆圓滿。
translation: They want to live in a celestial palace for the rest of their lives, adorn themselves with celestial jewelry, eat the finest foods in the heavens, and observe the precepts in all their perfection.

source_sentence: 或大族姓旃陀類，　　俱能持戒等生天，　貴賤種姓虧戒身，　　皆墮地獄無差別。
translation: Perhaps a member of the great family Cāṇḍā class can observe precepts and be born in the heavens, but noble and lowly castes lack the body of the precepts and are all sent down to hell without distinction.

source_sentence: 卑門持戒生天上，　　勝族毀犯墮幽冥，　摩登持戒亦生天，　　仙人破戒入諸獄。
translation: The humble family observes the precepts and is born in heaven, while the superior family violates the precepts and falls into the darkness, and the Mātaṅgīs also observe the precepts and are born in heaven, while the sages who violate the precepts enter the hells.

source_sentence: 王族多聞具色力，　　惡見無戒如獸蚖，　如甘果樹猛獸圍，　　猶蓮華池毒蛇止。
translation: A royal is well-versed in the power of form, but a bad view of morality is like a beast without precepts, like a sweet fruit tree surrounded by fierce animals or a lotus-flower pond stopped by vipers.

source_sentence: 寧守貧賤恒持戒，　　具聖財寶德嚴身，　破戒眾人之所輕，　　持戒天人咸信重。
translation: They would rather abide by the precepts in poverty and lowliness than maintain them, possessing the noble wealth and the virtue of an ornate body. Those who break the precepts are despised by many, but those who maintain them are respected by gods and humans.

source_sentence: 栴檀欝金及沈麝，　　如是一切不為香。
translation: Sandalwood, gold, and musk are not considered to be fragrances like these.

source_sentence: 菩薩持戒最勝香，　　遍出人天無有盡，　卑陋持戒後生天，　　現蒙王者所瞻禮，　此世他生安隱樂，　　如是戒果牟尼說。
translation: The most excellent fragrance of the bodhisattvas' observance of the precepts, which never ends among humans and gods, and the humble adherents of the precepts who are later born in a heaven, are now venerated by kings and given the benefit of peace and comfort in other lives in this world, thus is the fruit of the precepts explained by Muni.

source_sentence: 欲生人天及涅槃，　　如應具戒必當得，　是故精勤持淨戒，　　隨心所願皆圓滿。
translation: Those who want to be born in heaven or nirvāṇa will surely attain the precepts as they should be, so they diligently observe the pure precepts and fulfill their wishes as they see fit.

source_sentence: 若有臨終肢節痛，　　一切親屬欲分離，　諦思我有清淨戒，　　身心歡樂無憂畏。
translation: If there's pain in my limbs when I'm about to die, and I want to separate all my relatives, consider that I have pure precepts, and I'll be happy and fearless in body and mind.

source_sentence: 戒為惑病最勝藥，　　護諸苦厄如父母，　癡闇燈炬生死橋，　　無涯業海為船筏。
translation: The precepts are the most excellent medicine for the afflictions and illnesses, protecting all suffering and distress like a father and mother, a torch of delusion over birth and death, and a raft on the endless ocean of activity.

source_sentence: 帝釋轉輪威德主，　　富貴尊嚴無等倫，　家有僕隷能持戒，　　承事供養而親敬。
translation: Indra, the wheel-turning, authoritative lord of Indra, is wealthy, noble, and dignified beyond compare, and has servants who uphold the precepts and serve, support, and venerate him.

source_sentence: 若有臨至命終時，　　持戒破戒生安畏，　欲得當來極樂處，　　應當專意勤護持。
translation: If someone approaches the end of their life who upholds or breaks the precepts and becomes fearful, they want to attain the future abode of ultimate bliss, so they should concentrate their attention and diligently guard them.

source_sentence: 戒珠不假刀兵護，　　戒為伏藏無所侵，　戒為勇伴導前行，　　戒為出世莊嚴具。
translation: The jewel of the precepts isn't guarded by swords or weapons, the precepts are a concealment that's invulnerable, the precepts are courageous companions who lead the way, and the precepts are an adornment that transcends the world.

source_sentence: 我讚持戒諸功德，　　如佛世尊真實說，　為覺悟彼破戒者，　　令心堅住持淨戒。
translation: I praise the virtues of upholding the precepts, as the Bhagavān truly explains them, in order to awaken those who break them and make their minds firmly uphold the pure precepts.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 如我以此種種方便教化眾生，令住淨戒波羅蜜中。
translation: "Thus, I teach sentient beings in these various ways to abide in the perfection of pure morality.

source_sentence: 若有眾生瞋恚、憍慢、多諍競者，我以強力折伏其心，為其示現極可怖形，如羅剎等飲血噉肉，令其見已，驚恐惶懼，心意和柔，捨離怨結。
translation: If there are sentient beings who are angry, arrogant, and contentious, I use my strength to subdue their minds and show them a terrifying image like a Rāṣṭrapāla drinking blood and devouring flesh, so that when they see it, they're frightened and fearful, and their minds are gentle and free of the bond of enmity.

source_sentence: 若有眾生惛沈嬾憜，為其示現王賊、水火，及諸重疾種種危難，令其見已，心生惶懼，知有憂苦，厭離惛憜而自勉策，日夜精勤。
translation: If there are sentient beings who are depressed and confused, showing them the various dangers of kings and thieves, water and fire, and serious illnesses causes them to become frightened, know that they're suffering, become disillusioned with grief, and motivate themselves to work hard day and night.

source_sentence: 以如是等種種方便，令捨一切諸不善法，修習一切清淨善法，令除一切波羅蜜障，令開一切波羅蜜門，令超一切障礙險道，令到一切無障礙處。
translation: With these kinds of methods, they will abandon all unskillful qualities, cultivate all pure good qualities, remove all the arhat hindrances, open all the arhat gates, surpass all obstacles and dangerous paths, and reach all unobstructed places.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯得此菩薩雲網解脫，如諸菩薩摩訶薩，猶如帝釋已能摧滅一切煩惱阿脩羅軍，如大海水普能消滅一切眾生諸煩惱火，如劫盡火普能乾竭一切眾生諸愛欲水，如大猛風普能吹碎一切眾生諸見取幢，猶如金剛悉能摧破一切眾生諸我見山；而我云何能知、能說彼功德行？
translation: "I have only attained the liberation of this bodhisattva's web of clouds, just as the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and buddhas are like Indra, who has been able to destroy all the armies of the afflicted Ashura, like the ocean water that thoroughly extinguishes the fires of affliction in all sentient beings, like the fire that ends the eon that thoroughly dries up the waters of desire in all sentient beings, like the great violent wind that thoroughly blows down the banners of views and grasping of opinions in all sentient beings, like the adamantine Vajra that thoroughly destroys the mountains of self-view in all sentient beings; how could I know or explain their meritorious actions?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 此閻浮提摩竭提國菩提場中，有主地神名自性不動，汝詣彼問菩薩云何學菩薩行、修菩薩道。」
translation: In the site of enlightenment in the country of Magadha in Jambudvīpa, there's a lord earth spirit named Śubhavyūha, so go there and ask the bodhisattva how he trains in the bodhisattva practices and cultivates the bodhisattva path."

source_sentence: 時，善財童子禮大天足，遶無數匝，一心瞻戀，辭退而行。
translation: The Boy of Good Fortune then bowed his head at the feet of the Mahādeva, circled him for measureless turns, looked longingly at him with one heart, and withdrew.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子受天神教，漸次前行，往東北方趣摩竭國菩提樹王大道場處，將詣自性不動神所。
translation: Then, having been instructed by the celestial spirits, the Boy of Good Wealth gradually moved forward in sequence, heading northeast to the site of the great road of Bodhidharma King in Maghā and approaching the place of the self-natured Akṣobhya spirit.

source_sentence: 十千地神同在其中，更相謂言：「此來童子，即是一切如來寶藏，必當普為一切眾生作所依怙，必當普壞一切眾生無明[穀-禾+卵]藏。
translation: Ten thousand earth spirits were among them, and they said to each other, "This boy here is the treasury of all tathāgatas, who will surely serve as a refuge for all sentient beings and will surely destroy the store of ignorance [grain - grain + egg] in all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 此人已生法王種中，當以法繒而冠其首，當開智慧大珍寶藏；當執菩薩金剛慧劍，勇猛自在，得法無畏，摧伏一切異道邪論；當以法船於生死海，運濟眾生，令達彼岸。
translation: This person has been born among the seed of the Dharma king, will be crowned with the Dharma silken, will open up a great treasury of wisdom, will hold the bodhisattva's adamantine sword of wisdom, will be courageous and unafraid, will attain fearlessness in regard to the Dharma, and will subdue all mistaken theories, and will use the Dharma boat to transport sentient beings in the ocean of birth and death to reach the other shore.

source_sentence: 智解圓滿，猶如白月，必當息滅一切眾生熱惱亂心。」
translation: The full accomplishment of wisdom and understanding, like the white moon, will surely quell the feverish and disturbed minds of all sentient beings."

source_sentence: 爾時，自性不動神等一萬地神，即以神力震動大地，出雷吼聲，放大光明遍照三千大千世界。
translation: At that point, the ten thousand earth spirits, including the self-natured immovable spirit, shook the earth with their spiritual powers, produced a thunderous roar, and magnified their light to shine everywhere in the 3,000 great thousand worlds.

source_sentence: 種種寶物處處莊嚴，影潔光流遞相鑒徹，一切葉樹俱時生長，一切華樹咸共開敷，一切果樹靡不成熟，一切河流互相灌注，一切池沼悉皆盈滿。
translation: Everywhere, various treasures are adorned, shadows and brightness flow from one to the other, all the leafy trees grow at once, all the flowering trees bloom together, all the fruit-bearing trees don't fail to ripen, all the rivers flow into each other, and all the ponds are filled to overflowing.

source_sentence: 興大密雲，雨細香雨，遍灑其地。
translation: A great, dense cloud arises, and a fine, fragrant rain falls over the ground.

source_sentence: 香風時來，吹眾名華普散其上。
translation: When the fragrant wind comes, it blows multitudes of famous flowers that are scattered all over the place.

source_sentence: 無數音樂一時俱奏，出可愛聲，天莊嚴具，咸出美音，令人歡悅。
translation: Countless kinds of music are played at once, producing lovely sounds, and the gods are adorned with beautiful sounds that make people happy.

source_sentence: 天、阿修羅，乃至非人、牛王、象王、師子王等，皆大歡喜，踊躍哮吼，猶如大山相擊出聲。
translation: The gods, asuras, even nonhumans, the king of cattle, the king of elephants, and the lion king are all overjoyed and jump up and down, roaring and roaring like the sound of a great mountain striking each other.

source_sentence: 百千伏藏，自然涌現。
translation: A hundred thousand concealed things naturally spring forth.

source_sentence: 時，彼地神告善財言：「善來童子！
translation: The earth spirit then addressed Sun Cai, saying, "Well come, boy!

source_sentence: 汝於此處曾種善根，我為汝現，汝欲見不？」
translation: You have planted good roots here, and I will show them for you; do you want to see them?"

source_sentence: 爾時，善財禮地神足，遶無數匝，合掌而立，白言：「聖者！
translation: At that point, the good treasure worshipped the feet of the earth spirit, circled him for countless turns, stood with his palms together, and said, "Sage!

source_sentence: 唯然欲見。」
translation: I only wish to see it."

source_sentence: 時，彼地神以足按地，百千億阿僧祇摩尼寶藏自然涌出，開發顯現。
translation: When that earth spirit pressed his foot against the ground, a hundred billion incalculable maṇi treasures naturally sprang forth and were revealed.

source_sentence: 地神告言：「善男子！
translation: The earth spirit told them, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 今此寶藏隨逐汝行，是汝往昔善根果報，是汝福力之所守護，汝應恣意自在而用。
translation: Now, this treasure house follows you around, is the result of your good roots from the past, and it's guarded by your powers of merit, so you should use it freely and at will.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我得菩薩解脫，名難摧伏智慧藏，常以此法具足圓滿成熟眾生。
translation: I've attained the bodhisattva's liberation, which is called the store of indestructible wisdom, and I always fully and completely mature sentient beings with this teaching.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 我憶自從然燈佛來，常隨菩薩恭敬守護，如影隨形。
translation: I recall that since the Randana Buddha's arrival, I've always followed the bodhisattva's respectful vigilance, like shadow and form.

source_sentence: 從始至今，念念無間，觀察菩薩所有心行，普遍尋求深入菩薩一切誓願智慧境界，圓滿菩薩一切所修諸清淨行，思惟菩薩一切三昧，隨順、明達、安住菩薩一切法門，究竟了知一切心性，圓滿一切大自在力，增長一切無能壞法，遍往一切諸佛剎土，普受一切諸如來記，憶持現覺一切智性，轉於一切諸佛法輪，廣說一切修多羅門，大法光明普皆照耀，教化調伏一切眾生，示現一切諸佛神變，隨順解知，受持憶念，常無忘失。
translation: 從始至今，念念無間，觀察菩薩所有心行，普遍尋求深入菩薩一切誓願智慧境界，圓滿菩薩一切所修諸清淨行，思惟菩薩一切三昧，隨順、明達、安住菩薩一切法門，究竟了知一切心性，圓滿一切大自在力，增長一切無能壞法，遍往一切諸佛剎土，普受一切諸如來記，憶持現覺一切智性，轉於一切諸佛法輪，廣說一切修多羅門，大法光明普皆照耀，教化調伏一切眾生，示現一切諸佛神變，隨順解知，受持憶念，常無忘失。

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 乃往古世過須彌山極微塵數劫，有劫名莊嚴，世界名月幢，佛號妙眼；於彼佛所最初獲得此解脫門。
translation: It was an eon ago on Mount Sumeru, a very tiny number of eons ago, when there was an eon named Adorn, a world named Moon-banner, and a Buddha called Marvelous Eye, that first attained the gate of liberation.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我從是來，於此法門若入、若出，修習、增長，常見諸佛未曾捨離。
translation: Since then, I've entered and left this teaching, cultivated and developed it, and have often seen buddhas that I've never abandoned.

source_sentence: 始從初得，乃至賢劫，於其中間值遇不可說不可說佛剎極微塵數如來、應、正等覺，悉皆承事，恭敬供養。
translation: From the time I first attained it until the good eon, I've encountered an inexplicable, ineffable number of buddha-temples that are miniscule in number, all of whom I've served, respected, and made offerings to.

source_sentence: 亦見彼佛詣菩提樹坐道場時，現大神通種種佛事；亦見彼佛所有一切功德善根。
translation: I've also seen that Buddha perform various Buddha-works with great supernormal powers while sitting on the site of enlightenment at the bodhi tree, and I've seen all the merits and good roots of that Buddha.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯知此難摧伏智慧藏解脫門；如諸菩薩摩訶薩，常能隨侍一切諸佛，能持一切佛所說法，入一切佛甚深智慧，念念充遍一切法界，等如來身，生諸佛心、具諸佛法、作諸佛事，心心出生一切諸佛清淨法藏，離分別心常無間斷，而我云何能知、能說彼功德行？
translation: "I only know this liberation gate of the store of indestructible wisdom; just as bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, are always able to attend all buddhas, maintain the teachings of all buddhas, enter the profound wisdom of all buddhas, mindfully fill all the Dharma realms, equal the body of the Tathāgata, give rise to the minds of buddhas, embody the teachings of buddhas, perform the deeds of buddhas, and produce in their minds the pure Dharma stores of all buddhas, free from discriminating minds that are always without interruption, how could I know and explain their meritorious conduct?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 此閻浮提摩竭提國恒河北岸，有一大城名迦毘羅，有主夜神名曰春和；汝詣彼問菩薩云何學菩薩行、修菩薩道。」
translation: On the north bank of the Ganges River in Magadha, there's a large city named Kapila with a night god named Chunhe; go there and ask the bodhisattva how he trains in the bodhisattva practices and cultivates the bodhisattva path."

source_sentence: 時，善財童子禮地神足，遶無數匝，慇懃瞻仰，一心戀慕，辭退而去。
translation: The Boy of Good Fortune then bowed his head at the feet of the earth spirit, circled it measurelessly, paid homage to it, and retired with a single-minded admiration.

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子蒙地神教，一心思惟，憶持菩薩難摧伏智慧藏解脫門，修其三昧，學其軌則，觀其遊戲，入其智海，悟其甚深，行其勝行，住其大願，得其智慧，達其平等。
translation: After being instructed by the earth spirit, the boy of good fortune then focused his thoughts on recollecting the bodhisattva's liberation through the storehouse of indestructible wisdom, cultivating its samādhi, studying its principles, observing its play, entering its ocean of wisdom, awakening to its profundity, performing its superior practices, abiding in its great vows, attaining its wisdom, and realizing its equality.

source_sentence: 如是思惟，漸次前行，北度恒河，向迦毘羅城；至城南門，敬心右遶，從東門入，佇立未久，遇日沒時，心念隨順諸菩薩行，渴仰欲見春和夜神，於善知識生如來想。
translation: Thus thinking, he gradually moved forward, crossed the Ganges River to the north, and headed for the city of Kapilavastu. When he reached the city's south gate, he respectfully circled to the right and entered through the east gate.

source_sentence: 復作是念：「由善知識得周遍眼，普能明見十方境界；由善知識得廣大解，普能了達一切所緣；由善知識得三昧眼，普能觀察一切法門；由善知識得智慧眼，普能明照十方剎海。」
translation: Again, he thought, "Because a good teacher has attained the all-seeing eye, he can see the whole world in ten directions; because a good teacher has attained vast understanding, he can comprehend all perceptual objects; because a good teacher has attained the samādhi eye, he can universally observe all dharma aspects; and because a good teacher has attained the wisdom eye, he can universally illuminate the sea of buddhas in ten directions."

source_sentence: 作是念時，見彼夜神於虛空中，處眾色寶摩尼樓閣、香蓮華藏寶師子座；身真金色，頂髮紺青，眼如廣大青蓮華葉，形貌端嚴，見者歡喜，眾寶瓔珞以為嚴飾，身服朱衣，首戴梵冠，一切星宿炳然在體。
translation: When he thought this, he saw that night god sitting up in the sky in a jeweled mansion of many colors and a jeweled lion throne of fragrant lotus treasures, with a body of true gold, violet blue hair on top, eyes like the leaves of a huge blue lotus, an appearance so dignified that those who see it rejoice, adorned with jewelry, wearing a vermilion robe and a brahma crown, and all the stars standing out in his body.

source_sentence: 於其身上一一毛孔皆現化度無量無數世界眾生，臨欲顛墜墮惡道者，悉令免離而得解脫；是諸眾生或生人中、或生天上、或有趣向二乘菩提、或有修行一切智道，如是影像炳然顯現。
translation: In each pore of his body, he shows and liberates measureless and countless sentient beings in the world who are about to fall into a bad path and are all freed from it; whether those sentient beings are born among humans, up in the heavens, headed toward bodhi in the two vehicles, or cultivating the path of omniscience, such images are clearly displayed.

source_sentence: 又彼一一諸毛孔中，示現種種教化方便成熟眾生：或為現身種種形色，或為說法種種言音，或為示現聲聞乘道，或為示現獨覺乘道，或為示現諸菩薩行：菩薩勇猛、菩薩三昧、菩薩自在、菩薩住處、菩薩觀察、菩薩思惟、菩薩神通、菩薩境界、菩薩師子頻申、菩薩解脫遊戲，如是種種成熟眾生。
translation: In each of those pores, they show various ways to teach and mature sentient beings, whether by displaying the body in various forms, speaking the Dharma in various sounds, displaying the path of the śrāvaka vehicle, displaying the path of the pratyekabuddha vehicle, or displaying the bodhisattva practices of bodhisattva courage, bodhisattva samādhi, bodhisattva autonomy, bodhisattva abodes, bodhisattva observation, bodhisattva contemplation, bodhisattva superknowledge, bodhisattva realms, bodhisattva lion frequency, bodhisattva liberating play, and so on, to mature sentient beings.

source_sentence: 善財童子見聞此已，心大歡喜，踊躍欣慶，心願圓滿，愛敬尊重，以身投地，禮夜神足，遶無數匝，於前合掌而作是言：「聖者！
translation: After hearing this, the boy Sun Cai rejoiced greatly, jumped for joy, fulfilled his heart's desire, loved, respected, threw himself to the ground, saluted the feet of the god Yama, circled him countless times, put his palms together, and said, "Sage!

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，我心冀望依善知識威神力故，獲諸如來功德法藏，唯願聖者與我決定作依止處，示我趣向一切智道，令我於中修行增進，至十力地。」
translation: Having first aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, I was hoping to rely on the authority and power of a good teacher to acquire the treasury of the Tathāgatas' merits.

source_sentence: 時，彼夜神告善財言：「善哉！
translation: The night god then addressed Shanzai, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝能深心敬善知識，法力、聖力入汝身中，令汝勤求，不惜身命，一心親近，樂聞其語，隨順聽聞，修行其教；以汝親近、聞教、修行決定心故，當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: If you can deeply honor a good teacher, the power of the Dharma and the power of the sages will enter your body, cause you to diligently pursue it, spare neither your life nor limb, single-mindedly become intimate with him, happily hear his words, conform to what he hears, and cultivate his teachings; because of your intimacy, listening to his teachings, and cultivating a resolute mind, you will attain supreme, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我得菩薩教化調伏破一切眾生癡闇法光明解脫門。
translation: "I've attained the bodhisattva's bright and liberating approach of teaching, training, disciplining, and destroying the darkness of the Dharma for all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我於惡慧眾生起大慈心，於不善業眾生起大悲心，於作善法眾生起於喜心，於善惡二行眾生起不二心，於雜染眾生起令生清淨心，於邪行眾生起令生正行心，於劣解眾生起令興大解心，於嬾憜眾生起令生精進心，於樂生死眾生起令捨輪轉心，於住二乘道眾生起令住一切智心。
translation: I arouse great kindness in sentient beings with bad wisdom, great compassion in sentient beings with unskillful actions, joy in sentient beings who do good things, nonduality in sentient beings who do good and bad things, purity in sentient beings with defiled actions, right action in sentient beings with wrong actions, great understanding in sentient beings with poor understanding, effort in sentient beings with impotent actions, indifference to transmigration in sentient beings with pleasure in birth-and-death, and omniscience in sentient beings abiding in the two-vehicle path.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我以得此解脫門故，常與如是心共相應。
translation: Because I've attained this gate of liberation, I'm always associated with such a mind.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 我於夜暗人靜，鬼神盜賊諸惡眾生所遊行時，密雲、重霧、惡風、暴雨、日月星宿並皆昏蔽不見色時，見諸眾生若入於海、若行於陸、山林、曠野、沙磧險難，一切危厄諸恐怖處；或遭盜賊、或乏資糧、或迷惑方隅、或忘失道路，慞惶憂怖不能自出，我時即以種種方便而救濟之，為海難者示作船師、魚王、馬王、龜王、象王、阿脩羅王，及以海神、捕漁人像，為彼種種海難眾生而作救護；所謂：止惡風雨、息大波浪，於洄澓中及迷方中，引其道路、示其洲岸，令免怖畏悉得安隱。
translation: 我於夜暗人靜，鬼神盜賊諸惡眾生所遊行時，密雲、重霧、惡風、暴雨、日月星宿並皆昏蔽不見色時，見諸眾生若入於海、若行於陸、山林、曠野、沙磧險難，一切危厄諸恐怖處；或遭盜賊、或乏資糧、或迷惑方隅、或忘失道路，慞惶憂怖不能自出，我時即以種種方便而救濟之，為海難者示作船師、魚王、馬王、龜王、象王、阿脩羅王，及以海神、捕漁人像，為彼種種海難眾生而作救護；所謂：止惡風雨、息大波浪，於洄澓中及迷方中，引其道路、示其洲岸，令免怖畏悉得安隱。

source_sentence: 復作是念：『以此善根迴施眾生，願令捨離一切諸苦。』
translation: Again, he thinks, 'This is a way to return good roots to sentient beings, in the hope that they'll be freed from all suffering.'

source_sentence: 為在陸地一切眾生於夜闇中遭諸恐怖：瓦礫、荊棘、虎豹、豺狼、師子、惡獸、毒蛇、險路、盜賊、鬼神肆暴之處，現作日月及諸星宿、晨霞、夕電，種種光明，或作屋宅，或為人眾、天龍八部、菩薩如來，種種形相引導覆護，令其得免恐怖之厄。
translation: For all sentient beings on land who are exposed to the terrors of nighttime darkness, such as rubble, thorns, tigers, wolves, lions, wild animals, vipers, dangerous roads, thieves, and raging spirits, they are shown the sun and moon, the stars, the morning sun, the evening lightning, various lights, or houses, or the various forms of people, gods, dragons, and the eight bodhisattva tathāgatas, guiding and protecting them, so that they can be spared the trouble of terror.

source_sentence: 復作是念：『以此善根迴施眾生，悉令除滅諸煩惱闇。』
translation: Again, he thinks, 'This good root will be returned to sentient beings, and it will all remove the darkness of the afflictions.'

source_sentence: 一切眾生有惜壽命，有愛名聞，有貪財寶，有重官位，有著男女，有戀妻妾、眷屬、稠林，種種纏縛未稱所求多生憂怖，我皆救濟令其離苦。
translation: All sentient beings who cherish longevity, love fame and reputation, covet wealth and treasure, value official positions, are attached to men and women, are attached to wives and concubines, retinues, and dense forests, and are fettered by various things that they don't really want and are often sad and frightened, so I rescue them and free them from suffering.

source_sentence: 為行山險而留難者，為作善神現形親近，為作好鳥發音慰悅，為作靈藥舒光照耀，示其果樹、示其泉井、示正直道、示平坦地，或現龕室、或現勝居，令其免離一切憂苦。
translation: For someone who travels through a mountainous region and has difficulty, I'll create a good deity to show up and be close to, a good bird to make a sound to comfort them, a elixir to shine brightly, a fruit tree to show, a well to show, a straight path to show, a level place to show, or a niche to show, so that they're freed from all sorrow and suffering.

source_sentence: 為行曠野、險道、稠林，毒樹、藤蘿交蔽隱密，闍努囉獸潛伏傷殘，震吼出聲驚駭聞者；墮此難中種種憂怖，雲霧所暗，心識昏迷，種種事中而恐怖者，現大力身救其危難，示其正道，令得出離，作是念言：『願一切眾生伐見稠林、截愛羅網、出生死野、滅煩惱暗，入一切智無畏大城，到平坦處，畢竟安樂。』
translation: For someone who travels through wilderness, dangerous roads, or dense forests, is concealed by poisonous trees and vines, is concealed and maimed by animals like the janura, or whose voice shakes out and startles those who hear it, or who falls into various kinds of misfortune and fear, is darkened by clouds and mists, has delusions of consciousness, or is frightened by various things, he shows himself a powerful body to rescue them from danger, shows them the right path, causes them to escape, and says, 'May all sentient beings cut down dense forests, cut off webs of desire, escape the wilderness of birth-and-death, cease the darkness of affliction, enter the great city of fearlessness with omniscience, and reach a level place of ultimate happiness.'

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有眾生戰諍城邑，乃至小獸忿競無時，我以方便使其和好，各起慈心永息乖諍。
translation: 'If there are sentient beings who fight in cities and towns, or even small animals that fight angrily without time, I'll make them reconcile with each other with skillful means and each will become compassionate and put an end to their quarrels forever.'

source_sentence: 作是念言：『願一切眾生離煩惱諍，得法和合。』
translation: Have this thought, 'May all sentient beings be freed from affliction and strife and attain the harmony of the Dharma.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有眾生樂著國土角力，求取勝負不安，種種諍訟而憂苦者，我以方便令捨堅執，示現無常，令生厭離。
translation: If there are sentient beings who are attracted to the struggle for land, who are agitated by the pursuit of victory or defeat, and who are distressed by various disputes, I will make them abandon their strong attachments with skillful means and show them impermanence, so that they will become disillusioned.

source_sentence: 作是念言：『願一切眾生不著諸蘊，住一切佛薩婆若境。』
translation: Have this thought, 'May all sentient beings not be attached to the aggregates and abide in the realm of all buddha-saṃpāramitās.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有眾生樂著聚落，貪愛宅舍，常處黑暗，甘被繫縛，受諸苦者，我為說法令生厭離，令法滿足，令依法住。
translation: 'If there are sentient beings who are delighted with the villages, crave homes and dwellings, remain in darkness, and are willing to be bound and suffer, I will explain this to them, causing them to become disillusioned, fulfilling the teaching and allowing them to abide according to the teaching.

source_sentence: 作是念言：『願一切眾生悉不貪樂六處聚落，速得出離生死境界，究竟安住一切智城。』
translation: They think, 'May all sentient beings stop craving the six dwelling places and quickly escape the realm of birth-and-death and finally abide in the city of omniscience.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 若有眾生行闇夜中，迷惑十方；於平坦路生險難想、於險難道起平坦想，以高為下、以下為高，其心迷惑生大苦惱，我以方便舒光照及。
translation: "If there are sentient beings walking in the dark of night who are confused in ten directions, who give rise to perceptions of difficulty on level roads and flat perceptions on difficult paths, who think of high as low and low as high, and whose minds are confused and give rise to great suffering and distress, I'll shine a bright light on them with skillful means.

source_sentence: 若欲出者，示其門戶；若欲行者，示其道路；欲濟彼岸，示其橋梁；欲涉河海，與其船筏。
translation: If someone wants to get out, I'll show them the door; if they want to walk, I'll show them the way; if they want to reach the other side, I'll show them the bridge; and if they want to wade across a river or ocean, I'll give them a raft.

source_sentence: 若於熱時，示其清冷；若於寒際，示作溫和；暖殿、涼宮隨時適意。
translation: If it's hot, he shows it how cool it is; if it's cold, he shows it how mild it is; and if it's a warm or cool palace, he makes it suitable at any time.

source_sentence: 若或遊觀，常導其前，示其險易安危之處；欲休息者，示其城邑近處宮室，令其憩止；遠行渴乏，示其池沼、河水、流泉令其飲沐，華林果樹，使得清涼身心安樂。
translation: If someone wants to travel, he'll always show them a place that's dangerous and easy to visit; if they want to rest, he'll show them a town near a palace so they can rest; if they're thirsty from a distance, he'll show them a pond, river, or spring to drink from, and a grove of flowers and fruit trees to make them cool and comfortable in body and mind.

source_sentence: 若有父母、妻子、眷屬恩愛分離，令其合會無諸苦惱。
translation: If there are parents, wives, or retinues who are separated by affection, they'll be united with them and free from suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 作是念言：『如我於此照除闇夜救眾災厄，令諸世事悉得宣敘；願我普於一切眾生生死長夜無明闇處，以智慧光普皆照了，是諸眾生無有智眼，想心見倒之所覆翳，無常常想，苦中樂想，無我我想，不淨淨想；堅固執著我、人、眾生、蘊界處法；迷惑因果，不了善惡，殺害眾生乃至邪見；不孝父母，不敬沙門及婆羅門；不知惡人，不識善人；貪著惡事，安住邪法；毀謗如來，壞正法輪；於諸菩薩呰辱傷害，輕大乘道，斷菩提心；於有恩人反加殺害，於無恩處常懷怨結；毀謗賢聖，親近惡伴；盜塔寺物，作五逆罪，不久當墮三惡道中。
translation: 作是念言：『如我於此照除闇夜救眾災厄，令諸世事悉得宣敘；願我普於一切眾生生死長夜無明闇處，以智慧光普皆照了，是諸眾生無有智眼，想心見倒之所覆翳，無常常想，苦中樂想，無我我想，不淨淨想；堅固執著我、人、眾生、蘊界處法；迷惑因果，不了善惡，殺害眾生乃至邪見；不孝父母，不敬沙門及婆羅門；不知惡人，不識善人；貪著惡事，安住邪法；毀謗如來，壞正法輪；於諸菩薩呰辱傷害，輕大乘道，斷菩提心；於有恩人反加殺害，於無恩處常懷怨結；毀謗賢聖，親近惡伴；盜塔寺物，作五逆罪，不久當墮三惡道中。

source_sentence: 願我速以大智光明，破彼眾生無明黑闇，令其疾發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: May I quickly shine the light of great wisdom to pierce the darkness of ignorance in those sentient beings and cause them to quickly give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 既發心已，示普賢乘開十力道，亦示如來法王境界，亦示諸佛一切智城，諸佛所行，諸佛自在，諸佛成就，諸佛總持，一切諸佛同共一身，一切諸佛平等之處，皆令安住。』
translation: After awakening that mind, I'll show them the vehicle of Samantabhadra and the unlocking of the path of the ten powers, the realm of the Tathāgata Dharma King, the city of omniscience of the buddhas, what the buddhas do, how they are at ease, what they accomplish, how they are held in common, and where all the buddhas are equal, I'll make them all stand.'

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 一切眾生或病所纏、或老所侵、或苦貧窮、或遭禍難、或犯王法臨當受刑，無所依怙，生大怖畏，我皆救濟使得安隱。
translation: "All sentient beings who are afflicted by illness, attacked by old age, suffering from poverty, subject to misfortune, or about to be punished for violating the king's laws have no refuge and become very frightened, and I rescue them all and make them comfortable.

source_sentence: 謂：以方藥除諸病苦，供事老朽安樂終年，給足資具令無貧乏，無主作主、無歸作歸，苦難逼迫同事救攝，令離憂惱、令無怖懼。
translation: That is, I'll remove illness and pain with prescription medicines, provide for the aged and happy for their whole life, provide sufficient necessities so that they don't become poor, make lords of what's not theirs and make returnees to what's not theirs, rescue my colleagues when they're beset by suffering and hardship, free them from sorrow and trouble, and make them fearless.

source_sentence: 復作是念：『願我以法普攝眾生，令其解脫一切煩惱、生、老、病、死、憂悲苦患。
translation: Again, he thinks, 'May I use the Dharma to universally include sentient beings, freeing them from all afflictions, birth, old age, illness, death, grief, sorrow, and suffering.

source_sentence: 近善知識常行法施，勤修善業，速得如來清淨法身，住於究竟無變易處。』
translation: By approaching a good teacher, always practicing Dharma charity and diligently cultivating good actions, I'll quickly attain the Tathāgata's pure Dharma body and abide in a place that's ultimately changeless.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 一切眾生入見稠林，住於邪道，於諸境界起邪分別，常行不善身、語、意業，妄作種種諸邪苦行，於非正覺生正覺想，於正覺所非正覺想，為諸惡友之所攝持，以起惡見將墮惡道，我以種種諸方便門而為救護，令住正見，當生人天。
translation: All sentient beings enter the thicket of views, abide in wrong paths, form wrong discriminations in various realms, always perform unskillful bodily, verbal, and mental actions, deludedly engage in various wrong and painful practices, give rise to perceptions of right awakening that aren't right awakening and perceptions of what's not right awakening that are not right awakening, and are taken in by bad friends who will cause them to fall into a bad path because of the formation of bad views.

source_sentence: 復作是念：『如我救此將墜惡道諸眾生等，願我普救一切眾生，悉令解脫一切諸苦，住波羅蜜，出世聖道，於一切智得不退轉，具普賢願，近佛菩提，而不捨離諸菩薩行，常勤教化一切眾生。』」
translation: Again, he thought, 'As I saved these sentient beings who were about to fall into the evil path, may I save all sentient beings in general, liberate them all from suffering, abide in the perfection of wisdom, transcend the noble path, attain irreversibility in all knowledge, fully attain the vow of Samantabhadra, approach buddha-bodhi, and not abandon the practices of the bodhisattvas, always diligently teaching and transforming all sentient beings.'"

source_sentence: 爾時，春和主夜神欲重宣此解脫義，承佛威力，普觀十方一切法界，為善財童子而說偈曰：「我此寂靜解脫海，　　出生具足智光明，　遠離一切愚癡暗，　　觀眾生根而演說。
translation: At the time, the night god Haruha wanted to recapitulate the meaning of this liberation, and with the Buddha's authority, he universally observed the entire Dharma realm in the ten directions and spoke a verse for Boy Sunjay, saying, "This is my ocean of quiescent liberation, which gives rise to the perfect light of wisdom, is free of the darkness of all delusions, and observes the faculties of sentient beings and explains it.

source_sentence: 我於往昔無邊劫，　　具修廣大清淨慈，　如日普照於世間，　　汝應勇猛勤修習。
translation: In an infinite number of eons past, I cultivated a vast and pure compassion that shone universally in the world like a sun, so you should courageously and diligently cultivate it.

source_sentence: 我此難量大悲海，　　出生三世諸如來，　能救法界苦眾生，　　汝應勇猛勤修習。
translation: This incalculably large ocean of compassion that I have, which gives rise to the tathāgatas of the three times, can save suffering sentient beings in the Dharma realm, so you should courageously and diligently cultivate it.

source_sentence: 能生聖道無為樂，　　亦生世間安隱樂，　令我踊躍心歡喜，　　汝應入此甚深門。
translation: It produces the happiness of the noble path that's free from effort and the happiness of worldly peace that causes me to dance and rejoice, so you should enter this profound gate.

source_sentence: 已背有為如幻法，　　亦棄聲聞解脫乘，　常修佛力具莊嚴，　　汝應入此難思教。
translation: Having turned your back on the illusory dharma of existence, and having abandoned the vehicle of liberation for the śrāvakas, you should always cultivate the adornment of Buddha-power, and enter this difficult teaching.

source_sentence: 我眼清淨廣無邊，　　普見十方諸剎土，　其中所有一切佛，　　悉坐菩提樹王下。
translation: My pure eyes are limitless in scope, and I can see all the buddhas in the ten directions, all of whom are sitting under the king of the bodhi tree.

source_sentence: 見佛處於大眾會，　　相好莊嚴妙色身，　於諸毛孔放光明，　　一一光明恒普照。
translation: I see the Buddha in a great assembly, his beautifully proportioned and ornate body shining brightly from every pore, and each one of his lights constantly and universally shining.

source_sentence: 見諸群生墮業海，　　死此生彼各差別，　相續輪迴五趣中，　　常受種種無邊苦。
translation: He sees all sentient beings caught in the ocean of karma, dying here and there, being born differently, continuously reborn in the five destinies, and always experiencing various kinds of limitless suffering.

source_sentence: 我耳清淨量無邊，　　一念聽周諸剎海，　眾生所有語言法，　　皆悉憶持無忘失。
translation: The amount of purity in my ear is limitless, and with a single thought I hear the oceans of buddhas and buddhas, and I memorize and retain all the words and teachings of sentient beings without forgetting them.

source_sentence: 及聞諸佛轉法輪，　　其音勝妙無能比，　言辭訓釋諸方便，　　我悉憶持無忘失。
translation: I also hear the buddhas turn the wheel of the Dharma, whose sounds are unsurpassed in their beauty and subtlety, and I memorize and retain all the explanations of words and methods without forgetting them.

source_sentence: 我鼻廣博甚清淨，　　於諸法中無所著，　住一切處解脫門，　　汝應入此無疑惑。
translation: My nose is broad and very pure, so I'm not attached to any dharmas and abide at the gate of liberation in all places, so you should enter here without doubt.

source_sentence: 我舌光明赤銅相，　　具足清淨妙辯才，　巧宣妙法應群心，　　汝應入此無疑惑。
translation: My tongue is brilliant and red-bronze in appearance, fully pure and exquisitely eloquent, and I skillfully proclaim the wondrous Dharma to a multitude of minds, so you should enter here without doubt.

source_sentence: 我身離相恒清淨，　　常遍一切諸世間，　普隨信樂眾生心，　　為現色身令得見。
translation: My body is always pure and free of marks, always pervading all worlds, following the hearts of faithful sentient beings, and making visible the body in order to show them.

source_sentence: 我心離著無諸垢，　　如響普應諸眾生，　隨念悉見諸如來，　　而於其中不分別。
translation: My mind is free of attachment and undefiled, and as a resonant echo, I universally respond to sentient beings, seeing the tathāgatas at every thought and not discriminating among them.

source_sentence: 不思議剎眾生海，　　所有樂欲及諸根，　我於一念悉能知，　　而於其中不分別。
translation: I don't contemplate the ocean of sentient beings, the pleasures, desires, and faculties that exist, which I can fully know in a single thought and don't discriminate among them.

source_sentence: 我以廣大妙神通，　　普震難思諸佛剎，　威力光明無不現，　　調伏一切難調眾。
translation: With my vast and marvelous supernormal powers, I universally shake inconceivable buddha-blocs, and my mighty brightness never fails to show up, taming all the hard-to-control multitudes.

source_sentence: 我福廣大甚清淨，　　無量莊嚴無盡藏，　普能供養諸如來，　　等與一切眾生樂。
translation: My merit is vast and very pure, my adornment is limitless and inexhaustible, and I can offer offerings to all tathāgatas that are equal to the pleasure of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 我智廣博甚清淨，　　了達無邊諸法海，　普斷一切眾生疑，　　佛子宜應善修學。
translation: My knowledge is vast and very pure, my comprehension of the limitless ocean of teachings thoroughly ends the doubts of all sentient beings, and it's appropriate for the Buddha-child to train well.

source_sentence: 我知三世諸佛海，　　及了一切諸法海，　亦入彼諸大願門，　　此無等行應修習。
translation: I know the ocean of the buddhas of the three times and comprehend the ocean of all dharmas, and I've entered their great vows, so these peerless practices should be cultivated.

source_sentence: 我於三世剎塵中，　　悉見十方諸剎海，　亦見其中所有佛，　　此是普門無等力。
translation: In the dust of the buddhas of the three times, I've seen all the oceans of buddhas in the ten directions and all the buddhas within them, and this is the universal approach of unequalled power.

source_sentence: 普於十方一切剎，　　悉見大智盧舍那，　一切塵中坐道場，　　以寂靜音宣妙法。」
translation: In all the buddhas of the ten directions, I've seen Rocana, the great intellect, sitting on the site of enlightenment amidst all the dust, proclaiming the wondrous Dharma with his silent voice."

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子白春和主夜神言：「汝發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心經幾時耶？
translation: It was then that the boy Śubhaji said to the night god Harivaradhvaja, "How long has it been since you aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment?

source_sentence: 得此解脫其已久如，乃有如是大威德力，能作如是利益眾生？」
translation: Has he attained this liberation for so long that he has such great authority and power to do such a thing to benefit sentient beings?"

source_sentence: 夜神告言：「佛子！
translation: The god of the night told him, "Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 我念往古過須彌山極微塵數劫，有劫名寂靜光，世界名出生吉祥寶，五百億佛於中出現。
translation: I'm reminded that in an eon long ago, past the minutest number of eons on Mount Sumeru, there was an eon named Quiet Light, a world named Auspicious Birth, and 50 billion buddhas that appeared in it.

source_sentence: 彼世界中，有四天下名寶月燈光；有城名蓮華光；有轉輪王名妙法岸，具足七寶，領四天下，以聖王道安樂眾生。
translation: In that world, there are four worlds named Jewel Moonlight, a city named Lotus Light, and a wheel-turning king named Marvelous Dharma Shore, complete with seven treasures, who leads four worlds and pleases sentient beings with the path of a noble king.

source_sentence: 王有夫人名法智月，妓樂自娛，夜久眠寢。
translation: The king had a wife named Fazhi Moon who enjoyed herself as a courtesan and slept long into the night.

source_sentence: 時，彼城東有一大林，名寂靜出生妙德林中，有一大菩提樹，名一切勝法摩尼王莊嚴身，出生諸佛神力光明。
translation: At the time, there was a large forest east of that city named Silent Birth of Wonderful Virtue, and in that forest there was a large bodhi tree named Dharmakṣema King Adorned Body, which produced the miraculous powers and brightness of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 「爾時，有佛名一切法大吼聲王，於此樹下成等正覺，放無量色廣大光明，名摩尼王普照一切妙寶世界蓮華。
translation: "At the time, there was a Buddha named the Great Roaring King of All Dharmas who became perfectly enlightened under this tree and radiated a vast radiance of measureless color called the Maṇi King's lotus that universally illuminates the world of all marvelous treasures.

source_sentence: 城內有主夜神，名淨月光，詣王夫人法智月所，動身瓔珞、環珮出聲以覺夫人，而告之言：『夫人當知一切法大吼聲王如來，於寂靜出生妙德大林之中而成等正覺，及廣稱讚諸佛功德自在神力普賢菩薩所有行願，令王夫人發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，供養恭敬承事彼佛，及諸菩薩、聲聞僧眾。』
translation: Within the city, a night guardian named Purity Moonlight visited the king's wife, Fazhi Moon, moved her jewelry and ringlets to make a sound to awaken her, and told her, 'Madam, you should know that the Tathāgata, the Great Roaring Sound King of All Dharmas, has become perfectly enlightened in the midst of a great forest of tranquil birth and marvelous virtue, and extensively praises all the buddhas' merits, their unimpeded spiritual powers, and the vows of the Bodhisattvas, causing the king's wife to arouse the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and dignified service to that Buddha and to the bodhisattvas and śrāvaka saṃgha.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 時，王夫人法智月者豈異人乎？
translation: Wasn't Mrs. Wang Zhi Yue a different person?

source_sentence: 我身是也；我於彼佛發菩提心，深重愛敬種善根故，於須彌山極微塵數劫不生地獄、餓鬼、畜生諸惡趣中，亦不生於下賤之家，諸根具足，無有眾苦，於天人中福德殊勝，不生惡世，恒不離佛及諸菩薩、大善知識。
translation: "This is me; because I aroused the bodhisattva's aspiration for enlightenment and deeply respected the good roots planted there, I wasn't born in the most minute eons on Mount Sumeru in the bad destinies of hell, hungry ghosts, or animals, nor was I born in a lowly home with perfect faculties and without numerous sufferings, with excellent fortune among gods and humans, wasn't born in a bad world, and was never separated from the buddhas, bodhisattvas, and great good teachers.

source_sentence: 常於其所，種植善根，經八十億須彌山極微塵數劫，常受安樂而未滿足菩薩諸根。
translation: Always planting good roots in their place, they pass through eight billion Sumeru mountains in a very tiny number of eons, always enjoying well-being without fulfilling the bodhisattva's roots.

source_sentence: 過此劫已，復過萬劫，於賢劫前有劫名無憂遍照，世界名離垢勝德。
translation: After this eon, there's another 10,000 eons that precede the good eon, and that eon is called 'unsullied, pervasive illumination,' and the world is called 'unsullied, excellent virtue.'

source_sentence: 其世界中淨穢相雜，有五百佛於中出現。
translation: In that world, a mixture of purity and defilement exists, and five hundred buddhas appear in it.

source_sentence: 其第一佛名須彌幢大寂靜吉祥眼如來、應、正等覺；我為名稱長者女，字妙慧光明，端正殊妙，人相具足。
translation: The first of those buddhas is called Sumeru-banner, the great serene auspicious-eye tathāgata, worthy, and perfectly enlightened, and I'm called the elder woman with the word marvelous wisdom and radiance, which is upright and marvelous and replete with human features.

source_sentence: 「彼淨月夜神以本願力，於離垢勝德世界一四天下，眾色幢王城中作主夜神，名妙淨眼；我於一時在父母邊，夜久眠息；彼妙淨眼來詣我所，震動我宅，放大光明，出現其身，讚佛功德，言彼如來坐菩提樹，始成正覺，勸諭於我及以父母并諸眷屬，令速見佛；自為前導引至佛所，廣興供養。
translation: "That night god of the pure moon, who by the power of his former vow was the chief night god in the city of the king of the banners of many colors in the one or four worlds that are free from pollution and excellent virtue, was called the marvelous pure eye; at one point I was near my parents and had been asleep for a long time at night when that marvelous pure eye came to me, shook my house, magnified my light, appeared in his body, praised the merits of the Buddha, said that the Tathāgata was sitting on the bodhi tree and had just become perfectly enlightened, advised me, my parents, and my retinue to quickly see the Buddha, and led myself to the Buddha and made extensive offerings.

source_sentence: 我纔見佛，即得調伏眾生見佛三昧，及得普照三世智光明輪三昧。
translation: Once I had seen the Buddha, I attained the samādhi of disciplining sentient beings to see the Buddha and the samādhi of the wheel of wisdom and light that universally illuminates the three worlds.

source_sentence: 獲此三昧故，能憶念須彌山極微塵數劫，亦見其中一切諸佛菩薩出現於彼如來及菩薩所，聽聞妙法。
translation: Because of attaining this concentration, I was able to recall Mount Sumeru for an extremely tiny number of eons and see all the buddhas and bodhisattvas in it appear before that Tathāgata and bodhisattva and listen to the wonderful Dharma.

source_sentence: 以聞法故，即得此教化調伏破一切眾生癡暗法光明解脫門。
translation: As a result of hearing the Dharma, they then attain the liberation of teaching, disciplining, and disciplining the Dharma light that destroys the delusion and darkness of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 得此解脫故，即見其身遍十佛剎極微塵數世界，亦見彼世界所有如來，又見自身一一親近，亦見彼世界一切眾生，解其言音、識其根性，知其往昔曾為善友之所攝受，隨其所樂而為現身，令生歡喜。
translation: Because of this liberation, they see their bodies pervading the minutest number of worlds in the ten buddha bases, see all the tathāgatas in those worlds, see themselves close to each one, and see all the sentient beings in those worlds, understand their speech and sounds, recognize their faculties, know that they were taken in by good friends in the past, and present themselves in a body according to their desires, causing them to rejoice.

source_sentence: 我時於彼所得解脫，念念增長，此心無間，又見自身遍往百佛剎極微塵數世界；此心無間，又見自身遍往千佛剎極微塵數世界；此心無間，又見自身遍往百千佛剎極微塵數世界；如是念念乃至不可說不可說佛剎極微塵數世界。
translation: At the time, the liberation I attained there grew from moment to moment, and this mind without interruption saw itself going to a world of a hundred buddha bases and an extremely tiny number of dust; this mind without interruption saw itself going to a world of a thousand buddha bases and an extremely tiny number of dust; this mind without interruption saw itself going to a world of a hundred thousand buddha bases and an extremely tiny number of dust; and so on and so forth up to a world of an ineffable, ineffable number of buddha bases and an extremely tiny number of dust.

source_sentence: 亦見彼世界中一切如來，亦見自身在彼佛所聽聞妙法、受持憶念、觀察決了，亦知彼佛諸本事海，諸大願海。
translation: He also sees all the tathāgatas in that world, sees himself in that Buddha's place, hears the wonderful Dharma, retains it in his memory, observes it with certainty, and knows the ocean of his abilities and the ocean of his great vows.

source_sentence: 彼諸如來嚴淨佛剎，我亦嚴淨，亦見彼世界一切眾生心性、根器，形量差別，種類不同，隨其所應而為現身，教化調伏令此解脫，念念增長，如是乃至充滿法界。
translation: Those tathāgatas adorn and purify their buddha bases, and I also adorn and purify them. I also see the nature of the minds and faculties of all the sentient beings in that world, their various shapes and sizes, and their different types, and I present myself to them as they respond, teaching, disciplining, taming, and bringing about their liberation, which grows from moment to moment and thus fills the Dharma realm.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯知此菩薩教化調伏破一切眾生癡暗法光明解脫門。
translation: "I only know that this bodhisattva teaches, disciplines, and disciplines all sentient beings through the gate of liberation of the Dharma light from delusion and darkness.

source_sentence: 如諸菩薩摩訶薩成就普賢無邊行願，普入一切諸法界海，得諸菩薩金剛智幢自在三昧遊戲神通，心無障礙，出生大願，住持佛種。
translation: Just as the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas accomplish the boundless vows of Samantabhadra, universally enter the ocean of all the Dharma realms, attain the bodhisattvas' adamantine wisdom-banner autonomy, samādhi, play, and superknowledge, their minds are unobstructed, they generate a great vow, and they maintain the Buddha seed.

source_sentence: 於念念中成滿一切大功德海，嚴淨一切廣大世界，以自在智教化成熟一切眾生，以智慧日滅除一切世間闇障，以勇猛智覺悟一切眾生昏睡，以智慧月決了一切眾生疑惑，以清淨意斷除一切諸有執著，於一切法界一一塵中示現一切自在神力，智眼明淨，等見三世。
translation: In each moment of recollection, they complete all oceans of great merit, adorn and purify all vast worlds, mature all sentient beings with unimpeded knowledge, remove all worldly darkness with the sun of wisdom, awaken all sentient beings to drowsiness with courageous knowledge, resolve all sentient beings' doubts and confusions with the moon of wisdom, eliminate all attachments to existence with a pure mind, display all sovereign powers in each particle of the Dharma realm, and have a clear eye of wisdom that sees the three worlds equally.

source_sentence: 而我何能知其妙行、說其功德、入其境界、示其自在遊戲神通？
translation: How could I know their marvelous actions, explain their merits, enter their realms, and demonstrate their unimpeded play powers?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 此閻浮提恒河南岸，摩竭提國菩提場中，有主夜神名普遍吉祥無垢光，我本從其發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，常以妙法開悟於我。
translation: On the south bank of the Ganges River in Jambudvīpa, in the site of enlightenment in Magadha, there's a night guardian named Universally Auspicious Vimala, from whom I originally aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment and who always enlightens me with the wonderful Dharma.

source_sentence: 汝詣彼問菩薩云何學菩薩行、修菩薩道。」
translation: Go there and ask the bodhisattva how he trains in the bodhisattva practices and cultivates the bodhisattva path."

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子合掌恭敬向春和夜神，以偈讚曰：「我今見汝清淨身，　　色相端嚴如妙德，　威光超世無能比，　　殊特猶若寶山王。
translation: At that point, the boy of good fortune joined his palms in respect and paid homage to the god of spring and night with a verse praising him, "Now, I've seen your pure body, your appearance is dignified like marvelous virtue, your radiance is beyond compare in the world, and you're exceptional like a jeweled mountain king.

source_sentence: 見汝清淨妙法身，　　等於三世無分別，　普入一切諸世間，　　若壞若成無所著。
translation: Seeing your pure, marvelous Dharma body, it's equal to the three worlds without discrimination, enters all the worlds, and whether it breaks down or becomes something, there's no attachment.

source_sentence: 我今普觀一切趣，　　見汝所現差別身，　猶如星月處虛空，　　一毛孔中皆得見。
translation: Now, I've looked at all destinies and seen the distinct bodies you present, just like the stars and moon in space, and I can see them in every pore.

source_sentence: 汝心廣大常清淨，　　如空普遍於十方，　一切諸佛悉入中，　　智慧平等無分別。
translation: Your mind is vast and always pure, like space that pervades the ten directions, into which all the buddhas enter, and your wisdom is equal without discrimination.

source_sentence: 汝身一一諸毛孔，　　放剎塵數光明雲，　悉遍十方佛剎中，　　普雨一切莊嚴具。
translation: Each pore of your body emits a cloud of light that counts as dust, which thoroughly pervades the buddha bases of the ten directions and rains down all of their adornments.

source_sentence: 汝身一一諸毛孔，　　等眾生數而現身，　普於十方世界中，　　方便化度令調伏。
translation: Every pore of your body, the same number of sentient beings appears in your body, and you are everywhere in the worlds of the ten directions, teaching and disciplining them.

source_sentence: 汝身一一諸毛孔，　　示現不可思議剎，　普隨一切眾生心，　　莊嚴顯現令清淨。
translation: Each pore of your body shows unfathomable bases, follows the hearts of all sentient beings, and adorn and reveal them so that they're purified.

source_sentence: 若有眾生見汝身，　　聞名愛樂生歡喜，　獲功德利清淨命，　　當必成就大菩提。
translation: If sentient beings who see your body hear your name and delight in it, they'll rejoice, attain merit and rewards, and have a pure life, and they'll surely achieve great enlightenment.

source_sentence: 墮於惡趣無邊劫，　　恒受種種無量苦，　聞名暫發歡喜心，　　諸煩惱業皆銷滅。
translation: They'll fall into the evil destinies of infinite eons and experience measureless suffering of every kind, but when they hear the name and rejoice for a moment, all their afflictions and actions will cease.

source_sentence: 於千佛剎微塵劫，　　讚歎汝身一毛德，　微塵劫數猶可窮，　　汝身功德終無盡。」
translation: Throughout a thousand tiny eons of Buddha buddhas, they praised your body's single hair of virtue; the number of tiny eons could still be exhausted, but your body's merits will never end."

source_sentence: 爾時，善財童子以此妙偈讚夜神已，禮夜神足，遶無數匝，慇懃瞻仰，辭退而去。
translation: After praising the god of the night in this wonderful verse, the boy of good fortune bowed his head at his feet, circled the god countless times, paid homage to him, venerated him, and withdrew.

source_sentence: 大方廣佛華嚴經卷第十七
translation: Dafangguang fo huayan jing roll number seventeen
